item.title: How to setup a CI/CD pipeline with Codeship and GKE
item.description: I wrote an article about setting up a pipeline that is similar to what we have at Neso. You can read about it here: https://neso.io/innovation/how-to-setup-a-pipeline-with-codeship-gke
